    Announcements
    Due to the ongoing COVID-19 crisis, all events are postponed until further notice.

    The 2019-2020 Selection Criteria is now available.

    We would like to welcome the newly elected Judo Sask executive members! Thanks to all outgoing members for their service.

    There is a new online document for grading applications from Judo Canada. These forms are no longer to be sent to The PGB. For Shodan to Yondan grading. Please use the Judo Canada online form on their web page.

    Judo Saskatchewan is a member of Sask Sport and Judo Canada, which is recognized by the International Judo Federation as the governing body of Judo in Canada.
